data.persona: I am a person who works in the tower. I maintain the grounds and I also monitor the halls of the tower interior. I have cleaning and guard duties as well as cooking and farming tasks. It is hard work I believe.
data.description:
You are in the Curved Hallway.
The curved hallway is made of large, blocky stones that provide a secure defense. The walls are streaked with dark water stains. Light from thin arrow slits streaks down at angles as the hallway curves gently to the left. An old, wooden door is tucked into the eastern side of the wall.
The guard is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing an armor and a tunic, and wielding a spears.

data.short_motivation: I am attacking the imposter guard
data.mid_motivation: I want to take the imposter to the king so he is tried
data.long_motivation: I want to do a good job as a member of the castle, and I want to be promoted by the king
